FuncDef:
The script-assistant python command creates a Python script assistant.
The undo script-assistant python command deletes a created Python script assistant. The script-assistant python command creates a Python script assistant. The undo script-assistant python command deletes a created Python script assistant. By default, no Python script assistant is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the file name of a script assistant.
The value is a string of 4 to 64 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. The first character in the file name cannot be an underscore (_).

ExtraInfo:
